bibl.title: The Function of the σημασία-Texts, P. Oxy. XXXIV 2719 and SB XVI 12550.
bibl.note: Considerations of form, function and meaning indicate that the σημασία-texts accompanied the items to be sent: P. Oxy. XXXIV, 2719 and P. Osl. Inv. 1621 (= S.B. XVI, 12550) were written instructions carried by the courier. Suggests that the two papyri were returned to their respective sender together with the recipient's letter of reply.
bibl.seg: 145.4 P. Osl. Inv. 1621 P. Oxy. XXXIV, 2719
LLEWELYN S.R., The Function of the σημασία-Texts, P. Oxy. XXXIV 2719 and SB XVI 12550.

Considerations of form, function and meaning indicate that the σημασία-texts accompanied the items to be sent: P. Oxy. XXXIV, 2719 and P. Osl. Inv. 1621 (= S.B. XVI, 12550) were written instructions carried by the courier. Suggests that the two papyri were returned to their respective sender together with the recipient's letter of reply.
